name: Reading  Glasses Prescription Glasses
short_description: http://glassesmakers.com/ are committed to bringing prescription glasses and top designer eyeglasses & designer sunglasses to our customers at unbeatable prices. We are an online glasses retailer based in London (UK), and have been established since 2000. We don't have an expensive high street store to display our glasses and sunglasses, this means we can pass great savings of up to 80% on to our customers. We are able to supply glasses not only for those who require lower prescriptions, but also for those who require a stronger prescription, and who normally pay considerably more.
summary: Glasses, We offers the best glasses for men & women of different brand
